featured.text: From which of the following is the passage likely to be taken? (A) A science magazine.
However, this cannot be treated as a trivial finding in science.
This is an episode from a 1960 science fiction story.

definition.zh_def: 科學是研究自然現象及其規律的系統性知識。
definition.en_def: Science is a systematic enterprise that builds and organizes knowledge in the form of testable explanations and predictions about the universe.
definition.example: Science helps us understand the world around us.
